metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14329 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In HTSlib 1.8, a race condition in cram/cram_io.c might allow local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Neutralised by kernel hardening Upstream won't be fixing it

criterions.comment: htslib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
